java/liquibase/change/RenameColumnChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.RenameColumnStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.Arrays;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00020 public class RenameColumnChange extends AbstractChange {
00021 
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String tableName;
00024     private String oldColumnName;
00025     private String newColumnName;
00026     private String columnDataType;
00027 
00028     public RenameColumnChange() {
00029         super("renameColumn", "Rename Column");
00030     }
00031 
00032 
00033     public String getSchemaName() {
00034         return schemaName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00038         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getTableName() {
00042         return tableName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00046         this.tableName = tableName;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getOldColumnName() {
00050         return oldColumnName;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public void setOldColumnName(String oldColumnName) {
00054         this.oldColumnName = oldColumnName;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getNewColumnName() {
00058         return newColumnName;
00059     }
00060 
00061     public void setNewColumnName(String newColumnName) {
00062         this.newColumnName = newColumnName;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public String getColumnDataType() {
00066         return columnDataType;
00067     }
00068 
00069     public void setColumnDataType(String columnDataType) {
00070         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00071     }
00072 
00073     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00074         return new SqlStatement[] {
00075                 new RenameColumnStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getOldColumnName(), getNewColumnName(), getColumnDataType())
00076         };
00077     }
00078 
00079     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00080         RenameColumnChange inverse = new RenameColumnChange();
00081         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00082         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00083         inverse.setOldColumnName(getNewColumnName());
00084         inverse.setNewColumnName(getOldColumnName());
00085         inverse.setColumnDataType(getColumnDataType());
00086 
00087         return new Change[]{
00088                 inverse
00089         };
00090     }
00091 
00092     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00093         return "Column "+tableName+"."+ oldColumnName + " renamed to " + newColumnName;
00094     }
00095 
00096     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00097         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("renameColumn");
00098         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00099             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00100         }
00101         
00102         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00103         node.setAttribute("oldColumnName", getOldColumnName());
00104         node.setAttribute("newColumnName", getNewColumnName());
00105 
00106         return node;
00107     }
00108 
00109     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00110 
00111         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00112 
00113         Column oldColumn = new Column();
00114         oldColumn.setTable(table);
00115         oldColumn.setName(getOldColumnName());
00116 
00117         Column newColumn = new Column();
00118         newColumn.setTable(table);
00119         newColumn.setName(getNewColumnName());
00120 
00121         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, oldColumn, newColumn));
00122 
00123     }
00124 
00125 }
